data.name: QueryCountIncompletePartitions
QueryIsSplitRequestPending
QueryMarkJobAsCompleted
data.value: UPDATE [dipren].[jobs] SET [updated] = @timestamp, [completed] = @timestamp, [state] = @state OUTPUT INSERTED.[id] AS [id], INSERTED.[created] AS [created], INSERTED.[updated] AS [updated], INSERTED.[batch_size] AS [batch_size], INSERTED.[timeout] AS [timeout], INSERTED.[clock_drift] AS [clock_drift], INSERTED.[started] AS [started], INSERTED.[completed] AS [completed], INSERTED.[state] AS [state], INSERTED.[error] AS [error] WHERE ([id] = @id);

data.name: QueryMarkJobAsFailed
data.value: UPDATE [dipren].[jobs] SET [updated] = @timestamp, [state] = @state, [error] = @error OUTPUT INSERTED.[id] AS [id], INSERTED.[created] AS [created], INSERTED.[updated] AS [updated], INSERTED.[batch_size] AS [batch_size], INSERTED.[timeout] AS [timeout], INSERTED.[clock_drift] AS [clock_drift], INSERTED.[started] AS [started], INSERTED.[completed] AS [completed], INSERTED.[state] AS [state], INSERTED.[error] AS [error] WHERE ([id] = @id);

data.name: QueryMarkJobAsReady
data.value: UPDATE [dipren].[jobs] SET [updated] = @timestamp, [state] = @state OUTPUT INSERTED.[id] AS [id], INSERTED.[created] AS [created], INSERTED.[updated] AS [updated], INSERTED.[batch_size] AS [batch_size], INSERTED.[timeout] AS [timeout], INSERTED.[clock_drift] AS [clock_drift], INSERTED.[started] AS [started], INSERTED.[completed] AS [completed], INSERTED.[state] AS [state], INSERTED.[error] AS [error] WHERE ([id] = @id);

data.name: QueryMarkJobAsStarted
data.value: UPDATE [dipren].[jobs] SET [updated] = @timestamp, [started] = @timestamp, [state] = @state OUTPUT INSERTED.[id] AS [id], INSERTED.[created] AS [created], INSERTED.[updated] AS [updated], INSERTED.[batch_size] AS [batch_size], INSERTED.[timeout] AS [timeout], INSERTED.[clock_drift] AS [clock_drift], INSERTED.[started] AS [started], INSERTED.[completed] AS [completed], INSERTED.[state] AS [state], INSERTED.[error] AS [error] WHERE ([id] = @id);

data.name: QueryReportProgress
data.value: UPDATE [dipren].[partitions] SET [updated] = @updated, [position] = @position, [processed] = @processed, [remaining] = @remaining, [throughput] = @throughput, [is_completed] = @completed, [split_requester] = CASE WHEN @completed = 1 THEN NULL ELSE [split_requester] END OUTPUT INSERTED.[id] AS [id], INSERTED.[job_id] AS [job_id], INSERTED.[created] AS [created], INSERTED.[updated] AS [updated], INSERTED.[owner] AS [owner], INSERTED.[first] AS [first], INSERTED.[last] AS [last], INSERTED.[is_inclusive] AS [is_inclusive], INSERTED.[position] AS [position], INSERTED.[processed] AS [processed], INSERTED.[remaining] AS [remaining], INSERTED.[throughput] AS [throughput], INSERTED.[is_completed] AS [is_completed], INSERTED.[split_requester] AS [split_requester] WHERE ([id] = @id) AND ([owner] = @owner);

data.name: QueryRetrieveJobById
data.value: SELECT [id] AS "id", [created] AS [created], [updated] AS [updated], [batch_size] AS [batch_size], [timeout] AS [timeout], [clock_drift] AS [clock_drift], [started] AS [started], [completed] AS [completed], [state] AS [state], [error] AS [error] FROM [dipren].[jobs] WHERE ([id] = @id);

data.name: QueryRetrieveJobStatusReport
data.value:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
WITH "aggregates" AS ( SELECT t1.[id] AS [id], t1.[created] AS [created], t1.[updated] AS [updated], t1.[batch_size] AS [batch_size], t1.[timeout] AS [timeout], t1.[clock_drift] AS [clock_drift], t1.[started] AS [started], t1.[completed] AS [completed], t1.[state] AS [state], COUNT_BIG(CASE WHEN ((t2.[is_completed] = 0) AND (t2.[owner] IS NULL) AND (t2.[processed] = 0)) THEN 1 END) AS [partitons_untouched], COUNT_BIG(CASE WHEN ((t2.[is_completed] = 0) AND ((t2.[owner] IS NOT NULL) OR (t2.[processed] > 0))) THEN 1 END) AS [partitons_in_progress], COUNT_BIG(CASE WHEN (t2.[is_completed] = 1) THEN 1 END) AS [partitions_completed], SUM(t2.[remaining]) AS [keys_remaining], SUM(t2.[processed]) AS [keys_completed], COALESCE(MAX(t2.[updated]), t1.[updated]) AS [last_activity], COALESCE((SELECT SUM([acquired]) - COUNT_BIG(1) FROM [dipren].[partitions] WHERE ([job_id] = t1.[id]) AND ([acquired] > 0)), 0) AS [ownership_changes], COUNT_BIG(CASE WHEN ((t1.[state] = 'processing') AND (t2.[is_completed] = 0) AND (t2.[split_requester] IS NOT NULL)) THEN 1 END) AS [split_requests_pending], COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN ((t1.[state] = 'processing') AND (t2.[is_completed] = 0) AND (t2.[updated] >= DATEADD(MICROSECOND, (-1 * CAST((t1.[timeout] + t1.[clock_drift]) AS DOUBLE PRECISION)), @timestamp))) THEN [throughput] END), 0.0) AS [current_throughput] FROM [dipren].[jobs] t1 LEFT JOIN [dipren].[partitions] t2 ON (t1.[id] = t2.[job_id]) WHERE (t1.[id] = @id) GROUP BY t1.[id], t1.[created], t1.[updated], t1.[batch_size], t1.[timeout], t1.[clock_drift], t1.[started], t1.[completed], t1.[state] ) SELECT t1.[id] AS [id], t1.[created] AS [created], t1.[updated] AS [updated], t1.[batch_size] AS [batch_size], t1.[timeout] AS [timeout], t1.[clock_drift] AS [clock_drift], t1.[started] AS [started], t1.[completed] AS [completed], t1.[state] AS [state], t2.[error] AS [error], t1.[partitons_untouched] AS [partitons_untouched], t1.[partitons_in_progress] AS [partitons_in_progress], t1.[partitions_completed] AS [partitions_completed], t1.[keys_remaining] AS [keys_remaining], t1.[keys_completed] AS [keys_completed], t1.[last_activity] AS [last_activity], t1.[ownership_changes] AS [ownership_changes], t1.[split_requests_pending] AS [split_requests_pending], t1.[current_throughput] AS [current_throughput] FROM [aggregates] t1 INNER JOIN [dipren].[jobs] AS t2 ON (t1.[id] = t2.[id]);

data.name: QueryRetrievePartitionById
data.value: SELECT [id] AS [id], [job_id] AS [job_id], [created] AS [created], [updated] AS [updated], [owner] AS [owner], [first] AS [first], [last] AS [last], [is_inclusive] AS [is_inclusive], [position] AS [position], [processed] AS [processed], [remaining] AS [remaining], [throughput] AS [throughput], [is_completed] AS [is_completed], [split_requester] AS [split_requester] FROM [dipren].[partitions] WHERE ([id] = @id);

data.name: QueryTryAcquirePartition
data.value: WITH [candidates] AS ( SELECT TOP (@candidates) [id] FROM [dipren].[partitions] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ([job_id] = @job_id) AND (([owner] IS NULL) OR ([updated] < @active)) AND ([is_completed] = 0) ORDER BY [remaining] DESC ), [candidate] AS ( SELECT TOP 1 t2.[id] FROM [candidates] AS t1 INNER JOIN [dipren].[partitions] AS t2 WITH (ROWLOCK) ON (t1.[id] = t2.[id]) WHERE (t2.[job_id] = @job_id) AND ((t2.[owner] IS NULL) OR (t2.[updated] < @active)) AND (t2.[is_completed] = 0) ORDER BY NEWID() DESC ) UPDATE [dipren].[partitions] SET [updated] = @updated, [owner] = @owner, [acquired] = ([acquired] + 1) OUTPUT INSERTED.[id] AS [id], INSERTED.[job_id] AS [job_id], INSERTED.[created] AS [created], INSERTED.[updated] AS [updated], INSERTED.[owner] AS [owner], INSERTED.[first] AS [first], INSERTED.[last] AS [last], INSERTED.[is_inclusive] AS [is_inclusive], INSERTED.[position] AS [position], INSERTED.[processed] AS [processed], INSERTED.[remaining] AS [remaining], INSERTED.[throughput] AS [throughput], INSERTED.[is_completed] AS [is_completed], INSERTED.[split_requester] AS [split_requester] FROM [candidate] WHERE ([dipren].[partitions].[id] = [candidate].[id]);

data.name: QueryTryRequestSplit
data.value: WITH [candidates] AS ( SELECT TOP (@candidates) [id] FROM [dipren].[partitions] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ([job_id] = @job_id) AND ([owner] IS NOT NULL) AND ([updated] >= @active) AND ([is_completed] = 0) AND ([split_requester] IS NULL) ORDER BY [remaining] DESC ), [candidate] AS ( SELECT TOP 1 t2.[id] FROM [candidates] AS t1 INNER JOIN [dipren].[partitions] AS t2 WITH (ROWLOCK) ON (t1.[id] = t2.[id]) WHERE (t2.[job_id] = @job_id) AND (t2.[owner] IS NOT NULL) AND (t2.[updated] >= @active) AND (t2.[is_completed] = 0) AND (t2.[split_requester] IS NULL) ORDER BY NEWID() DESC ) UPDATE [dipren].[partitions] SET [split_requester] = @requester FROM [candidate] WHERE ([dipren].[partitions].[id] = [candidate].[id]);
